chatzilla_disconnect.txt

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

Left chatzilla running in background.
FF 8.0
CZ 0.9.87


Actual results:

Got disconnected. 
According to the attached wireshark log, chatzilla stops sending PONG replies, until it gets disconnected.

(this problem started in an earlier version of FF (4 iirc), but I never found the time to create a clear capture)
